mapper.insert: insert into order_form (order_id, order_type, order_number, commodity_name, cargo_weight, mail_people, mail_address, place_receipt, order_state, mail_people_phone, consignee, consignee_number, origin_city, midpoint_city, destination_city, ship_price, dispatching_price, transport_price, total_price, vehicle, notes ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailPeoplePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consigneeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpointCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinationCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dispatchingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update order_form set order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cargo_weight = #{cargoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mail_people = #{mailPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail_address = #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place_receipt = #{placeReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mail_people_phone = #{mailPeoplePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_number = #{consigneeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_city = #{originCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpoint_city = #{midpointCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination_city = #{destinationCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_price = #{shipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dispatching_price = #{dispatchingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transport_price = #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle = #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_type, order_number, commodity_name, cargo_weight, mail_people, mail_address, place_receipt, order_state, mail_people_phone, consignee, consignee_number, origin_city, midpoint_city, destination_city, ship_price, dispatching_price, transport_price, total_price, vehicle, notes from order_form where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select order_id, order_type, order_number, commodity_name, cargo_weight, mail_people, mail_address, place_receipt, order_state, mail_people_phone, consignee, consignee_number, origin_city, midpoint_city, destination_city, ship_price, dispatching_price, transport_price, total_price, vehicle, notes from order_form
